thread.title: Colleen of Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Colleen of Los Angeles

author: Colleen of Los Angeles
title: Colleen of Los Angeles
text: Website is easy to use, with handy information, makes it easy to compare options between reputable agencies. We are renting in Italy, and we have heard some warnings of certain rental car companies -- happy to see none of the ones we were warned against were here. The ones included here are pretty solid from what we have heard. When we used this company in the past, it was a smooth, easy experience - and that includes renting a child seat, picking up and leaving in different locations, speaking minimal language -- so we'll keep coming back.
